verses.text: 基督耶穌的僕人保羅和提摩太，寫信給所有住在腓立比，在基督耶穌裡的聖徒、監督和執事。

words.note: Often used with 在 (zài) to mean 'in' or 'among'.
Connects descriptive phrase to noun.

verses.heading: Salutation

verses.text: 願恩惠平安從我們的父 神和主耶穌基督臨到你們。

words.note: Refers to God as Father.

verses.text: 我每逢想到你們，就感謝我的 神；
verses.heading: Prayer for the Church

verses.text: 每次為你們大家祈求的時候，總是歡歡喜喜地祈求。

words.note: Forms a noun phrase '祈求的時候'.
Reduplicated form for emphasis.
Connects an adverbial phrase to a verb.

verses.text: 為了你們從頭一天直到現在都在福音的事工上有分，我就感謝我的 神。

words.definition: for the sake of, because of

words.note: Lit. 'blessed news'.
Often combined with 在 (zài) to indicate location or aspect.

verses.text: 我深信那在你們中間開始了美好工作的，到了基督耶穌的日子，必成全這工作。

words.note: Often refers to God completing His work.

verses.text: 為你們眾人我有這樣的思想是很恰當的，因為你們常常在我的心裡，無論我是在捆鎖之中，或是在辯護和證實福音的時候，你們都和我一同分享 神的恩典。

words.note: Refers to physical imprisonment, often Paul's.
Lit. 'blessed news'.

verses.text: 我是怎樣以基督耶穌的心腸，切切地想念你們眾人，這是 神可以為我作證的。

words.note: Figurative for deep affection or compassion, often divine.
Reduplication for emphasis.

verses.text: 我所禱告的，是要你們的愛心，在充足的知識和各樣的見識上，多而又多，

words.note: A verb-object compound.
In a spiritual context, refers to discerning truth.
Idiomatic phrase meaning 'increasingly abundant'.

verses.text: 使你們可以辨別是非，成為真誠無可指摘的人，直到基督的日子，

words.note: Literary phrase, means 'nothing to criticize'.

verses.text: 靠著耶穌基督結滿了公義的果子，使 神得著榮耀和讚美。

words.note: Refers to the Christian God; '　' is often used to show reverence.

verses.text: 弟兄們，我願意你們知道，我所遭遇的反而使福音更加興旺了，

words.note: A respectful term for fellow Christians.
Forms a nominalized phrase with the following verb.
Lit. 'blessed news'.

verses.heading: Ministry as a Prisoner

verses.text: 以致整個宮裡的衛隊和其餘一切的人，都知道我是為了基督才受捆鎖的；

words.definition: so that, with the result that

verses.text: 而且大多數主內的弟兄，因我所受的捆鎖，就篤信不疑，毫無畏懼，更勇敢地傳講 神的道。

words.note: Refers to fellow believers, 'those in Christ'.
A general term for fellow Christians.
An idiom emphasizing strong faith.
Refers to the Christian God; '　' is often used to show reverence.
In a biblical context, often refers to God's message or truth.

verses.text: 有些人傳揚基督是出於嫉妒和紛爭，但也有些人是出於好意。
這些人是出於愛心，知道我是派來為福音辯護的。

words.note: Lit. 'love heart'.
Lit. 'blessed news'.

verses.text: 那些人傳講基督卻是出於自私，動機並不純正，只想加重我在捆鎖中的煩惱。

words.note: Often refers to imprisonment in biblical context.

verses.text: 那有甚麼關係呢？真心也好，假意也好，無論怎麼樣，基督總被傳開了，為此我就歡喜；並且我還要歡喜，
因為我知道，藉著你們的祈求和耶穌基督的靈的幫助，我一定會得到釋放。

words.note: Refers to the Holy Spirit or a person's spirit.

verses.text: 我所熱切期待和盼望的，就是在凡事上我都不會羞愧，只要滿有膽量，不論生死，總要讓基督在我身上照常被尊為大。

words.note: Forms a nominal phrase from the following verb.

words.definition: be honored as great, be magnified
words.note: Lit. 'be honored as great'.

verses.text: 因為我活著就是基督，我死了就有益處。

words.note: A transliteration of 'Christos' (Anointed One).

verses.text: 但如果我仍在世上活著，能夠使我的工作有成果，我就不知道應該怎樣選擇了！

words.note: Refers to the physical world, often contrasted with spiritual realms.

words.definition: to be able to, capable of

words.note: In biblical context, 'fruit' often refers to spiritual results or produce.

verses.text: 我處於兩難之間，情願離世與基督同在，因為那是好得無比的。

words.definition: to be in, to be at

words.note: Often used in religious contexts to refer to death or leaving this earthly life.
Common phrase in religious contexts for divine presence or fellowship.
Indicates the degree or result of the preceding verb/adjective.

verses.text: 可是為了你們，我更需要活在世上。

breakdown.m: completed action (here, part of prepositional phrase)

verses.text: 我既然這樣深信，就知道還要活下去，並且要繼續和你們大家在一起，使你們在信心上有長進，有喜樂，

words.note: Common fixed phrase meaning 'together' or 'with one another'.
A core theological concept meaning trust and reliance on God.
Functions as a postposition, indicating area or aspect, often with 在.
In a spiritual context, refers to spiritual maturity and development.
Often used in the Bible to describe spiritual joy from God.

verses.text: 以致你們因為我要再到你們那裡去，就在基督耶穌裡更加以我為榮。

words.definition: so that, with the result that

words.note: Used as a postposition to indicate location.
Part of the structure '更加...為榮' (to make something more glorious).
Part of the construction '以...為...' (to consider...as...).
Part of the construction '以...為...' (to consider...as...).

verses.text: 不過，你們行事為人（「行事為人」原文也可譯作「作公民」）應當和基督的福音相配。這樣，無論我來見你們或是不在你們中間，都可以聽到你們的情況，就是你們有同一的心志，站立得穩，為了福音的信仰齊心努力，

words.note: Refers to one's moral and spiritual conduct.
Lit. 'blessed news'.
Used here as part of '或是' meaning 'or'.
Refers to spiritual resolve or mindset.
Emphasizes stability, often in faith or conviction.
Lit. 'blessed news'.
Lit. 'believe and look up to'.

verses.text: 甚麼事都不怕有反對你們的人，這就證明他們要滅亡，你們要得救，這都是出於 神。
因為 神為了基督的緣故賜恩給你們，使你們不單是信基督，也是要為他受苦；

words.note: Often used with '為...的' to mean 'for the sake of'.

verses.text: 你們面對的爭戰，和你們在我身上所見過，現在又聽到的是一樣的。

words.note: Implies personal experience or literally 'on my body'.
Forms a noun clause or emphasizes the verb.
Forms a noun phrase, 'that which you have heard'.
Often follows adjectives or phrases to form a descriptive noun/adj.
